entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or flurries changing to rain showers or drizzle this morning then to snow this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
